org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication

Class EnableReplicationUserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.ReplicationUserData
      • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.EnableReplicationUserData

  • public class EnableReplicationUserData
extends ReplicationUserData
    This class is used to store the information provided by the user to enable replication. It is required because when we are in interactive mode the ReplicationCliArgumentParser is not enough.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnableReplicationUserData() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean configureReplicationDomain1()
      Returns whether the user asked to configure the replication domain on the first server or not.
      boolean configureReplicationDomain2()
      Returns whether the user asked to configure the replication domain on the second server or not.
      boolean configureReplicationServer1()
      Returns whether the user asked to configure the replication server on the first server or not.

      Returns whether the user asked to configure the replication server on the second server or not.

      Returns the dn to be used to bind to the first server.

      Returns the dn to be used to bind to the second server.

      Returns the password for the second server.

      Returns the replication port to be used on the first server if it is not defined yet.
      int getReplicationPort2()
      Returns the replication port to be used on the second server if it is not defined yet.
      boolean isSecureReplication1()
      Returns true if the user asked to have secure replication communication with the first server and false otherwise.

      Returns true if the user asked to have secure replication communication with the second server and false otherwise.
      boolean replicateSchema()
      Returns true if the user asked to replicate schema and false otherwise.
